name: hocofni

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba), wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba))

body.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba)
-| wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wi(wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba)
-| wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wi(wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba))

body.origin:
|- wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba)
-| wi(wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba))
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)

body.origin: |- wi(wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba), wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(c0, c1), chba)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)

comment: Functionality of composition of Hilbert space operators. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
